Big Data @ Netflix: 40M subscribers, 5M ratings/day, 3M searches/day, 50M plays/day, 5B hours in Q3 2013. - @xamat #qconsf
Is tuning a system based on user data analogous to machine learning? In search, "tuning" often opposite of machine-learned approach. #qconsf

Data science in the factory vs the lab: data products are about operational analytics, not just investigative analytics -@josh_wills #qconsf

Biggest difference between lab & factory data science: whether output is a report or is part of a shipped data product - @josh_wills #qconsf
"All products of any consequence will become data products." - @josh_wills #qconsf
Being able to iterate quickly is more important than how well you do the first time. Optimize for speed of iteration. - @josh_wills #qconsf
Before you invest in a complex solution, do the simplest thing that could possibly work. - @josh_wills #qconsf
